select: select pol_no as pol_no , pao_grp_kd_cd as pao_grp_kd_cd , pao_grp_seq as pao_grp_seq , endr_no as endr_no , sppo_kd_cd as sppo_kd_cd , sppo_resd_reg_no as sppo_resd_reg_no , sppo_age as sppo_age , sppo_nm as sppo_nm , sppo_occp_cd as sppo_occp_cd , sppo_occp_pgrs_cd as sppo_occp_pgrs_cd from ltcontract.tjh130) new_tjc130 on new_tje910.pol_no = new_tjc130.pol_no(+) //@violation and new_tje910.pao_grp_kd_cd = new_tjc130.pao_grp_kd_cd(+) //@violation and new_tje910.pao_grp_seq = new_tjc130.pao_grp_seq(+) //@violation and new_tje910.endr_no = new_tjc130.endr_no(+) //@violation
